name: Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies Corporation
description: Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies Corporation, commonly known as Wabtec Corporation, is a leading global provider of equipment and services for the freight and transit rail industries. Founded in 1869 and headquartered in Wilmerding, Pennsylvania, Wabtec specializes in the manufacturing of a wide range of products, including braking systems, air conditioning systems, and other components for locomotives, freight cars, and transit vehicles. The company has a rich history of innovation, playing a pivotal role in the development of advanced railway technology and safety systems. Wabtec serves customers worldwide, helping to improve the efficiency and safety of rail operations through its cutting-edge solutions. In addition to its extensive product offerings, Wabtec is also dedicated to sustainability and the reduction of environmental impact, focusing on technologies that enhance fuel efficiency and reduce emissions in the transportation sector. Through strategic acquisitions and partnerships, Wabtec continues to expand its global footprint and product capabilities, establishing itself as a trusted partner in the rail industry.
